comment._content:
Year of death for Clara H. Hasse has been updated from 1924 to 1926, in both the title and description field. 

Thank you!

comment.author: 23572466@N04
comment._content: The woman identified as Mary K. Berger is Mary K. Bryan. Also mislabeled here: siarchives.si.edu/blog/faces-crowd
